name: mailu
description: Mailu is a lightweight, self-hosted mail server solution built from Docker components. It includes webmail, admin UI, and optional components like antivirus and LDAP, ideal for private email hosting.
features: Modular architecture: Choose which components to deploy including webmail, antivirus, and webdav.
Admin interface: Manage domains, users, and aliases through a clean web-based control panel.
Antivirus scanning: Optional ClamAV integration for scanning incoming and outgoing email attachments.
Webmail options: Choose between Roundcube or Rainloop for webmail interface.
LDAP support: Integrate with existing LDAP directories for centralized user authentication.
Rate limiting: Protect against abuse with configurable sending limits per user or domain.
TLS encryption: Enforce encrypted connections for both incoming and outgoing mail traffic.
Fetchmail integration: Retrieve mail from external accounts and deliver to local mailboxes.
Docker-based: All components run in Docker containers for easy deployment and updates.
Multi-domain hosting: Host email for multiple domains from a single Mailu instance.
Sieve filtering: Users can create custom mail filtering rules using Sieve scripts.
Quota management: Set storage limits per mailbox to control disk usage.
